thread.section_title: Yelp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Yelp | www.yelp.com
thread.title: William

author: William
title: William
text:
Worst thing a business could ever do! This company should be taken down! How dare they list your business and not give the owner the right to remove their business from their site!
Automated replies from support email and they will list your negative/fake reviews to the top of search results and list your positive reviews to the bottom.
they also are only interested in getting your advertising dollars and not telling the true.
